org.kepler.workflowscheduler.gui

Class SchedulerAbstractAction

  • java.lang.Object
    • javax.swing.AbstractAction
      • org.kepler.workflowscheduler.gui.SchedulerAbstractAction
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.event.ActionListener, java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Cloneable, java.util.EventListener, javax.swing.Action, AuthenticationListener
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    DisableScheduleAction, EnableScheduleAction, RemoveScheduleAction, ScheduleWorkflowAction

    public class SchedulerAbstractAction
extends javax.swing.AbstractAction
implements AuthenticationListener
    Represent an abstract actions which operates a workflow scheduler server. The subclasses include ScheduleWorkflowAction, RemoveScheduleAction, EnableScheduleAction and DisableScheduleAction
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
